drupalNodeEvent.title: How Sustainable Is the China Innovation Juggernaut?

field_speakers.processed: Craig Allen (US-China Business Council), Paul Triolo (Eurasia Group), Matt Turpin (Hoover Institution), Denis Simon (Duke University)

field_organizers.processed: The Center for Innovation Policy at Duke Law

field_description.processed: The speakers will provide insights intro the key variables that will shape China's emerging technological trajectory.
